name: ASTROVITY
description:
ASTROVITY

Help find Astra's parents on a mission throughout the galaxy! Traverse hundreds of handcrafted levels to save your family somewhere in the vast expanse of space!

Astrovity is a challenging skill based puzzle game in which gravity is your only ally.

  • Single Player Story
  • 200+ Puzzles
  • HardCore Levels
  • Local Multiplayer - Beta

GOOD LUCK!
